gates
Class FastAndLooseGate

java.lang.Object
  gates.Gate
      gates.FastAndLooseGate
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageHandler
public class FastAndLooseGate
extends Gate

This gate will send tokens to the parking lot regardless of how many tokens it has.

FastAndLooseGate

public FastAndLooseGate(long timeToWait,
                        int tokensToStartWith,
                        int moneyToStartWith,
                        java.net.InetAddress addr,
                        int port,
                        int moneyPerCarPassed,
                        int tradingPolicy,
                        int costPerToken)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a gate in the exact same way as its super class

Parameters:
timeToWait - The time cars should wait before leaving
tokensToStartWith - The number of tokens the gate starts with
moneyToStartWith - The amount of money the gate starts with
addr - The address the gate is listening on
port - The port the gate is listening on
moneyPerCarPassed - The amount of money the gate gains per car passed
tradingPolicy - The type of trading policy the gate will used
costPerToken - The cost of a token to trade for
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

onCarArrived

public void onCarArrived(CarArrivalMessage arrival)
Description copied from class: Gate
Specifies what to do when a car arrives at the Gate. First the car is added to the queue of waiting cars, Then, while there are still tokens left cars are let in

Overrides:
onCarArrived in class Gate
Parameters:
arrival - The information about the car that just arrived
